channel.title: Client Log-In edit?
channel.description:
Well, on my client on the Log-In screen you can see what the IP that the client is using and the port. How do I prevent this and hide that? Picture:
[IMG]http://i630.photobucket.com/albums/uu25/Jackz-Pkz/dsfgfd.png[/img]
Thanks in advance.

item.title: Client Log-In edit?
item.dc:creator: @Ill_Pk_You Ill Pk You
item.description:
@Ill_Pk_You wrote:

[quote=“Fat Cookies, post:2, topic:280143”]In your client class search and delete the following lines.

aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4_1272.method389(false, true, c / 2 - 90, 0xfff00, "Port:" + port + ((anInt1216 == 3) & (anInt1105 % 40 < 20) ? "" : ""), j);
            j += 15;

and just below that

aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4_1272.method389(false, true, c / 2 - 90, 0xfff00, "@whi@Server IP: " + server + ((anInt1216 == 2) & (anInt1161 % 40 < 20) ? "@xxx@|" : ""), j); j += 15;

Blank out your Server IP before you get into trouble or your server ddos’ed[/quote]

I search for that in my Client.class file and nothing is found? I also searched for that in my Cleint.java and still nothing found. What else should i possibly look in?

Read full topic

item.title: Client Log-In edit?
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

In your client class search and delete the following lines.

aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4_1272.method389(false, true, c / 2 - 90, 0xfff00, "Port:" + port + ((anInt1216 == 3) & (anInt1105 % 40 < 20) ? "" : ""), j);
            j += 15;

and just below that

aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4_1272.method389(false, true, c / 2 - 90, 0xfff00, "@whi@Server IP: " + server + ((anInt1216 == 2) & (anInt1161 % 40 < 20) ? "@xxx@|" : ""), j); j += 15;

Blank out your Server IP before you get into trouble or your server ddos’ed
